description: Test cases for triage urgency assessment

cases.symptoms: Severe chest pain radiating to my left arm, feeling sweaty and nauseous, started 30 minutes ago
Sudden severe headache, face drooping on one side, difficulty speaking, arm feels weak
Sharp abdominal pain in lower right side for 12 hours, getting worse, low grade fever
Feeling very depressed for weeks, can't get out of bed, having dark thoughts about not wanting to be here anymore
Knee pain that started a few weeks ago after starting running, worse when going up stairs, no swelling
Red itchy rash on my arms for about a week, started after switching laundry detergent
Runny nose, mild sore throat, slight cough for 2 days, no fever
Sore muscles after working out yesterday, nothing unusual just typical post-exercise soreness
Having trouble catching my breath when walking short distances, started last week, also have swollen ankles
Feeling anxious and worried a lot lately, trouble sleeping, heart races sometimes when stressed
